casebody.data:
DOMINO'S PIZZA, LLC, a Foreign Limited Liability Company, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Joseph Hardy, Jr., District Judge, Respondents,
and
Jonathan Deary, an Individual; and Megan Christine Hines, an Individual, Real Parties in Interest. No. 72961 Supreme Court of Nevada. MAY 15, 2018

DENIED.
